alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Cave Creek, New River; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 8:41PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa County through 930 PM MST... At 840 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from Arrowhead Mall to Glendale Sports Complex to near Arizona State Fairgrounds. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Peoria, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, El Mirage, Tolleson, Youngtown, Sun City West, Waddell, Sun City, New River, Litchfield Park, Cave Creek, Piestewa Peak Park, Deer Valley Airport, North Mountain Park, Arizona State Fairgrounds and Downtown Peoria. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 126 and 145. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 200 and 226. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 3 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Cave Creek, New River; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley
